version_description:
Version 1.0.5:
-Changed ArcTapLight texture
-Made charts with a visual reverse more "playable"
-Fixed an issue causing Arctaps to be below the track
-UI changes and rework
-Added more resolution options
-Tweaked hitboxes
-Tweaked hold timings
-Tweaked tap sound timing
-Reduced possible cheating smh
-Increased floor lane hit area
-Fixed issue causing song to play while still paused
-Added option to disable voidarcs to improve performance on potatoes
-Lag fixes
-Procedural GC collection to reduce lag spikes

Version 1.0.6
-New song Overload by PTB10!
-Fixed UI issues
-New camera ease
-Reduced Partner Cheating + Reduced Unshatter requirements
-Changed Particle FX/textures
-Input not attached to fixed camera
-Fixed some chart teleport issues
-Added link to Get Charts
-Fixed hold input
-Audio offset now input field
-Modifiers: Easy, Hard, Visual, Mirror
-Perfect Pures and indicators
-Option to shift judgment times

Version 1.0.7
-Fixed issue causing partner to be broken in hard
-Fixed recollection rate mismatch
-Fixed Critical bug causing game freeze and audio skip on certain devices
-General gameplay tweaks

Version 1.0.9:
-iOS 13 compatibility
-Increased Speed up to 6.5
-Fixed bug causing game crash when loading a song without appropriate permissions for partner image (on first launch will ask for permission to photos, please allow).
